name: Pixel Spider
description:
Pixel Spider

This is a very hungry spider, any creature will do as a prey. Your goal is to trap every insect, bug and creature within your web.

Progress through an unlimited number of levels, capturing and eating everything in sight, new enemies make it into the menu as you advance.

Remember, the spider is hungry and your metabolism is vary fast, therefore time is limited before you starve, think fast but also be careful, if you get hit outside the safety of your web, the hunter may become the hunted.

Controls

To control your spider click anywhere inside the area and drag until the aim pops-up, then release to move.

Features

- Many enemies with varying challenges.
- Progressive dificulty.
- Player upgrades.
- Buffs/Debuffs.
- Unlimited levels.
